title: Irreversible
description: Keir Sarafian knows he is not a rapist and did nothing wrong. But no one will believe that he’s the good guy he knows he is—no one except his father, Ray. And Ray’s just the person Keir has to leave in order to have the fresh start he deserves.In the follow-up to Inexcusable, Keir must confront the kind of person he really is and realize that though events may be in the past, they are as inescapable as they are irreversible.
author: Chris    Lynch
